name: EDD Persian CS
author: Javad Ahshamian

sections.description:
This plugin will show the countries and states of Iran to Persian Language in edd plugin.

Features:

  • Show Countries name to Persian Language in edd plugin.
  • Show States Name of Iran to Persian Language in edd plugin.

Language Support:

  • English
  • Persian

Donations

You can Donate plugin author here http://ham3da.ir/payment/
sections.installation:
1. Upload edd-pcs to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload edd-pcs to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Does this plugin automatically setting Countries States and name to Persian Language?

Yes.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Standard Translation in Persian language

1.0.1

  • Correction of spelling the name of a state

1.0

  • Start Plugin
